aboutText:
Hello, we are currently 4 students of the University of Applied Sciences of Western Switzerland and this application is developed within the framework of a project highlighting the use and learning of flutter, firebase and the scrum framework. 

If you have any problems or if you simply want to contact us, do not hesitate to write us a message via the Contact page of the application. 

Developed by Abgottspon Daniel, Ferrari Bastien, Rexhepi Valon and Yergen Samuel. Icons made by Smashicons, monkik and Freepik from flaticon.com.

Copyright HES-SO Valais/Wallis.
messageNotSent: Your message has not been sent.
contactText: Do not hestitate to send us your feedback. We are looking forward to hear from you!
connectText: Link your "Connected Shirt" to this app easily.
monitorText: Stay always up-to-date about your data and see your trends.
beFreeText: Explore the beautiful nature of Valais and use the app in offline mode.
